sections.heading: et seq. of this title shall be a part of the Insurance Code and shall be known and may be cited as the "Long-Term Care Insurance Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1987, c. 175, ยง 25, eff. Nov. 1, 1987. Amended by Laws 1989, c. 107, ยง 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1989; Laws 1995, c. 244, ยง 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1995.
